column5: Charming home located in the Historic Heights neighborhood. The Veranda House is nestled in one of the most eclectic, charming, and walkable neighborhoods in Houston. The Veranda House is blocks away from neighborhood bars and restaurants on 19th Street, a short walk to the Heights Hike and Bike Trail, and 5 miles from Downtown Houston.
column8: HEIGHTS VERANDA HOUSE 5 miles from Downtown
